website_summaries.verdict: Angel Soft toilet paper provides comfort and performance with their mega rolls, sold in a pack of 24 rolls.
pros: Sizable rolls that fit well on most paper holders
Thick enough for comfort but thin enough not to cause clogs
cons: Is not 3-ply like many competing brands offer

customer_reviews.title: but feels more like 1-ply. Cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to save a trip to the store. Supposed to be 2-ply, but feels more like 1-ply. Cheap price, but also cheap quality. Tears easily. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good value if you like it
customer_reviews.text: The price was great and I love the mega triple roll, however, the 2-ply is pressed so tightly that it feels like 1-ply. It tears wonderfully at the perforation and no lint. It gets the job done but I still prefer triple roll 2ply Charmin strong. It's softer and I believe I use less squares.
customer_reviews.author: Qbert

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised...buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, rough paper. Advertises mega, 484 sheets per roll...but it’s literally 1/3 the size of Charmin’s 426 sheet rolls! I’m tired of all the mis-information and false advertisement provided to the public by the TP companies. Had it been as advertised, the $19 would have been a decent price. As is, I feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: A little too pricey for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I can have this delivered but the price is still "pricey" for what you get. I usually purchase the "off brand" at Costco but because I couldn't get to Costco soon enough, I ordered through here. The product itself is just fine as I always have used Angel Soft and have no plumbing issues with it as I do with Charmin or Cottonelle. I gave it 3 stars for the price of what you get. Not a great value.
customer_reviews.author: OkieFromMuskogee

customer_reviews.title: Woodchipp'n No Dingleberries
customer_reviews.text: If you like camping in the woods and finding moss or a leaf to wipe yourself with after blessing the earth with your bodily fluids...this is the toilet paper for you! If you don't like having soft toiletty paper dingle-berries (Charmin) left in between your cracks...this is the toilet paper for you! If you like wiping without disintegration of the paper between your fingers...this is the toilet paper for you! I believe I'm going to have to go with the disposable wet wipes because this cardboard toilet paper is for the bears!
customer_reviews.author: Editor_theArthursKrownConsulting

customer_reviews.title: Missing part of my product!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this product with no problem, but this time when I opened the box, there was a whole pack of toilet paper missing!! I’m supposed to receive 4 packs of 6 double rolls and I only received 3!! I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yarixa Morales

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Toilet tissue
customer_reviews.text: Not sure whether this a knockoff or what. The 2 layers are so thin, that you can almost read through them, the paper feel is very brittle, a real chafer. Not like the tissue of the same name at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Pharrisworth

customer_reviews.title: Beats newspaper...
customer_reviews.text: Ever wipe barbeque sauce off your beard with a Kleenex? (I'm Theresa's husband. Theresa doesn't have a beard.) Soft and absorbent, but leaves more crumbs than Hansel and Gretel. Also seems to form some kind of glue when exposed to moisture that adheres tenaciously to any follicle originated growth. Fortunately, the magic formula used in 90% of adult marketed cleansing wipes releases the bond. Still better than the John Wayne toilet paper at work. It's rough and tough and doesn't take any crap from anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Product recommended
customer_reviews.text: My plumber recommended Angel soft after we had the same toilet clogged by paper twice within a month. Per his words, the other brand was "like using a paper towel". We haven't had any issues since switching, and none of my family members have complained. Product still works great, but doesn't cause any issues. These mega rolls allow for less frequent changing of the rolls.
customer_reviews.author: bvanderpol

customer_reviews.title: This IS NOT good toilet paper!!!
customer_reviews.text: Angel soft is, well was, my favorite toilet paper. The rolls are super big but scratchy & thin. If you're not a hand washer this is not the toilet paper for you. It reminds me of the toilet paper in the restaurant I work in. I woke up this morning with the stomach flu & "raw" is all I can say about that. I will NEVER buy this brand of toilet paper again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Moore

customer_reviews.title: Thin single ply
customer_reviews.text: I realize that it’s Angel Soft because it is eluding to the fact that when you go to wipe the majority of what separates your hand and rearend.... is air. I’m not a big fan of the single ply stuff, I should have read the details a little more closely. You will be praying that angels bring back your multiply rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Dinks_no_more

customer_reviews.title: Thin & Rough
customer_reviews.text: This TP is nothing close to what is advertised. It’s thin, rough, and harsh! They said is was comparable to Charmin Ultra — it is not. Period. I wish I could return it but now I’ve opened it and used some. I guess we’ll just put it in the guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe rejects?
customer_reviews.text: The inside of half the rolls were all messed up, not allowing the rolls to easily roll. This is something I never ASSumed I would find aggravating, BUTT it was! PEElease don't send out CRAPPY rolls that don't roll. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item before and was pleased with it, however this time I'm very disappointed. It states that it is 2-ply but it is not. I only purchase 2-ply as I refuse to get 1-ply. The first time I purchased it was as stated 2-ply as was, thus the reason I repurchased. After complete inspection I could not find more than 1 layer of paper......it's only 1-ply!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love having the toilet paper delivered to my front door
customer_reviews.text: I love having the toilet paper delivered to my front door. Saves me the hassle of purchasing every week. I purchase as a case and it lasts me for at least 2 - 3 months. Very, very convenient for a daily necessity. I would highly recommend purchasing this type of product thru Amazon. It is a time saver. I also like the quality of the paper. 2 ply and mega rolls. - perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Debmeistertoo

customer_reviews.title: Got Cheated!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item many times previously from Amazon, even when I knew it would be a later shipment because, I believe, it was a dropship item. This item came from Target Stores. It wasn't the same item nor was there any quality. This was a lesser quality item at a greatly increased price. Could have used my computer print paper! There was no mention it was coming from Target ANYWHERE. If I wanted to get conned I could have walked to my local Target and burned my money there!!!! Amazon--GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing Product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this tissue multiple times and have been very pleased. However, this last order was terrible. It is very rough and does not feel as thick or absorbant as previous purchases. The price has increased significantly as well. Guess I will be going back to purchasing from another vendor. Is it possible that this Amazon vendor is selling “seconds.”
customer_reviews.author: 2007Jeep

customer_reviews.title: Angel Soft is usually my go to for toilet paper ...
customer_reviews.text: Angel Soft is usually my go to for toilet paper. The plan is in our home is to use it for what toilet paper is made for. “It’ll do’” As long as there is always some available, I will not be complaining. Price is usually a bit lower than some other brands. I also find that appealing.
customer_reviews.author: DJE

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. No surprises.
customer_reviews.text: The write your review box asks me "what did you use this product for?". Wellll.... First of all I used it to fill a space on my shelf. Then I used it for Something Else. It did the job quite adequately.
customer_reviews.author: JonBrawn

customer_reviews.title: Got this as an open package so I got a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an open package so I got a killer price. Not so sure about the quality as compared to the double roll. this mega roll seems to be quite a bit less soft as the double roll. As this is my second mega roll purchase with the same results, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnne W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulky Deal
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Buying in bulk like this is really cost-effective. No complaints at all about the quality of the toilet paper. This stuff lasts a while. The only con is looking for a place to store it all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Only 435+ Sheets per roll with 2 packs of 12 rolls each. The 12-roll pack is almost 51 square feet less. The size of each roll is only 3.8 X 4.0 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Critterbob

customer_reviews.title: Best Toilet Paper
customer_reviews.text: Angel Soft has the right amount of softness with the right amount of durability. I keep trying to switch brands because most are cheaper, and I always find myself going back to Angel Soft. So far I have not found a brand as good as this so I will be sticking with them.
customer_reviews.author: KLL

customer_reviews.title: Good tiolet paper
customer_reviews.text: Not 5 star because rolls are too big. Honestly did not even fit dispensers, but the quality and price are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Why buy at the store when you can have it delivered
customer_reviews.text: I despise buying toilet paper, so being able to do so online and at a quantity I can survive without worrying of running out anytime soon is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I love Angel Soft and you get a lot in a roll. Not so many cardboard rolls in the garage can at the end of the week!!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Excellant quality bath tissue.
customer_reviews.text: I so dislike cheap toilet paper, but this is perfect and very soft. So much easier to order it than buy it at the grocery store and cart it home. I buy it in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: It's TP..... it's good
customer_reviews.text: We use this brand on the regular and it's cheaper to order here than go out and get it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina P

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: I love this TP , definitely my favorite but the price fluctuates and sometimes I will buy a cheaper brand. But when it's priced Right it's what I always use.
customer_reviews.author: luv2flip2001

customer_reviews.title: Rough and thin
customer_reviews.text: Thin as tissue paper and just as rough. It truly is a rough ride all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: best tp ever imo
customer_reviews.text: having it on subscription for the 3 packs of the 6 double rolls is awesome bc it takes me more than a month to get through it so I usually skip a month and order every other month
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin toilet paper. Multiple people in my family asked why I switched from our normal Sam’s Club toilet paper and when we were going back.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, didn't realize it was one ply
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, didn't realize it was one ply. Angel sift is a decent lost cost brand but might be worth to spend a little more for a higher quality if your budget allows for it. But these did the job!!!
customer_reviews.author: MILANI

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and shipped like they said. The quality is a little rougher than what you get locally store bought but the benefit of online ordering and having it shipped to your door is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of ordering this online and it’s here the next day! The rolls are truly mega rolls and 24 lasts me for over two months. I have IBS so I go through more toilet paper than the average person! It’s a good price also!
customer_reviews.author: Julmor

customer_reviews.title: Nice on the butt
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good value. It’s soft and feels good. It’s safe for septic systems.
customer_reviews.author: Darren W. Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: The only TP i will use
customer_reviews.text: I've tried tons of toiler papers over the years, but I keep on coming back to Angel soft. Its the perfect compromise, not too thin or thick, just the right sturdiness, and it goes on sale quite a bit
customer_reviews.author: DooleyMoe

customer_reviews.title: This toilet paper dissolves fast in your pipes. After ...
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper dissolves fast in your pipes. After several expensive clogs, my plumber told me to use Angel Soft. Not one problem since. It breaks down faster in your pipes.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Save $$$
customer_reviews.text: Buying in bulk will save u some coin. Cheaper 2 do this than buying same amount at grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: luvnick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Something is not right with this toilet paper. Very rough.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: These rolls are truly 'mega'. Careful that they will fit your holder if you have one. Saves me a lot of storage space and i don't change the roll as often though. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Moy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: These mega rolls are great quality and they last forever. This 24-pack lasts at least a month and the price is great at 83 cents per roll with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: A staple in our house
customer_reviews.text: We use Angel Soft because our plumber said they are best for our sewer system. But it’s still soft and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: alison859

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: This is our fave toilet paper. Priced decently, you get a decent amount. Not itchy or too thin.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: it's soft and awesome
customer_reviews.text: it's TP...what else is there to say? buy it and thank me later
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: MEGA ROLLS HARDER THAN DOUBLE
customer_reviews.text: MEGA ROLLS review: we had been getting the double rolls for a long time and never had any issue. I switched to the MEGA ROLLS this time because it said it was THE SAME but took up less storage room. This MEGA ROLL is much harder paper than the double rolls and we are very disappointed. NOT AS ADVERTISEDN
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: The item on site was exactly how it arrived as described.
customer_reviews.text: The item on site was exactly how it arrived as described.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Angel Rough
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I really expected this to be much softer. It's borderline rough on the skin. It's a good price, but not as soft as people really need.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with it. It saved me a trip from going to the store
customer_reviews.author: Niesha

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: It’s true that you do get more rolls but it also way too thin. I think we will stick with charm brand.
customer_reviews.author: BB0183

customer_reviews.title: Value toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: Good price, wish it was a little thicker, but the value was a pretty good price, it was okay. I would probably buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product, some confusion on the sizing, otherwise great buy, saved much time and effort!!!
customer_reviews.text: great product, some confusion on the sizing. It is a lot of product and the contents came in quad plastic wrapping. Had to make the space for them, otherwise great buy, saved much time and effort!!!
customer_reviews.author: FifiLuvsamazon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely my favorite brand when it comes to material
customer_reviews.text: My cat certainly likes them. He steals rolls all the time and tears them up so ordering in bulk saves me from running out as quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacket

customer_reviews.title: Quality toilet paper at reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.text: Love how long the mega rolls lasts. Quality toilet paper at reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: Starlet Skye

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I always use AngelSoft. It's the best. This was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Beth hostelley

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough and nice enough
customer_reviews.text: This product has the perfect blend of toughness and usefulness. Texture is good.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It’s toilet paper. It’s white. It’s soft. It works.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? It’s toilet paper. It’s white. It’s soft. It works. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: gardener97

customer_reviews.title: It smells bad. I always use Angel soft
customer_reviews.text: This packaging of toilet paper stinks. It smells bad. I always use Angel soft, but the rolls in this package stink.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Vince

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: almost half of them had mildew and were not useable
customer_reviews.author: Alleykat13161

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product & we’ve not had any issues with it. Cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: rbadgett

customer_reviews.title: Crayola
customer_reviews.text: Would be cool if it was in stock. Crayons eaters destroy everything
customer_reviews.author: Cornholio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easier than getting at the store and works for our needs
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mega TP
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on TP. Love the nice mega size rolls as don’t have to change out as often.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Super buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellant quality for the price and the extra large rolls are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: MountainAngel64

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Only brand of toilet paper we buy for our family of 6. We have 3 bathrooms, so gotta keep it stocked up.
customer_reviews.author: sara w.

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not flimsy. Won't leave lint where you don't want it.
customer_reviews.text: It is what you would expect from Angel Soft. Soft without being flimsy. Strangely, these are packaged differently from the Mega Roll 6 packs you can buy in stores. These have 2 rows of three while in store, they are three rows of 2. Maybe it is a space issue in the fight for limited shelf space. These seem a little less tightly wound than the ones in stores which is strange since hey are the same size. It almost makes me wonder if they are thinner than usual. But they don't seem to be.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: MEGA VALUE
customer_reviews.text: who knew a megs size well Amazon did great value for the money reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Mario J. Bottieri

customer_reviews.title: Grocery’s
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and delivery to my daughters apartment in Boston
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Dalessandro

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy in sale. Only thing is I'm use to a little softer roll. But this isn't that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Had it in two days. Great quality and lasts well.
customer_reviews.author: Gammaw06!

customer_reviews.title: Back to buying TP at the store
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but the 2-ply parts separate when you unroll it. I won’t be buying it again
customer_reviews.author: Greta Rosler

customer_reviews.title: Buying in bulk is better!
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing I didn’t like about this product. I like the quality and quantity. I like how long. It lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Feels like 1 ply
customer_reviews.text: Although it's 2 ply toilet paper, it is very thin and feels like 1 ply. I will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Judi82

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal same as product you would purchase from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product but not happy that it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product but not happy that it was boxed with other items so it was too big to be delivered and I had to go pick it up!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Super thin, would barely count it as 2ply. Very rough too. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but not very soft
customer_reviews.text: The price is good, but this toilet paper is not very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: The "Soft" in the name is a lie.
customer_reviews.text: This is not soft at all. Feels rough and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: eo

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, basically feels like 1 ply. Wish I didn’t buy such a big box.
customer_reviews.author: DB22201

customer_reviews.title: Thickness and softness
customer_reviews.text: Is very thin and not soft. Wal-Mart great value tissue is much better
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better buy the Kirkland's
customer_reviews.text: I thought it says 4 packs of 12. I got 4 packs of 6. so It's not actually that cheap. Better buy the Kirkland's roll
customer_reviews.author: Siska Napthalina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good texture. Does not form little balls like some do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: breaks up very easily when wet and sticks to you
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap paper; breaks up very easily when wet and sticks to you... Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Singh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Thin not as advertised. Need to use double what normally used for Charmin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too thin. Leave this review to mark that I shouldn't but this again.
customer_reviews.author: Xixi

customer_reviews.title: Quilted northern is not angel soft
customer_reviews.text: Love that I ordered angel soft and received quilted northern. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Alison Mabe

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Best quality for the price out there. Really don't understand why people tend to pay more for those larger name brands, when all you need is something that "gets the job done". Buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bulldops

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Toilet Paper was cheap quality and I had to walk a mile to find it at the wrong doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: Lari L.

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Thin tissue paper quality. Have to use 2x as much. As bad as most public restrooms use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The brand I buy anyway; at a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I had to look at this twice to see if it was right. I pay close to double for exactly this at the grocery store. This is the mega rolls people! You can barely fit on your roller ( a good thing) It’s the brand I usually buy anyway because I found it to be good for the money . For some reason my husband goes through toilet paper like nobody’s business so I can’t afford to go for the really expensive stuff . Still 2 ply, still soft does what is supposed to do at a very good price , now thanks to Amazon,right at my doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bauman

customer_reviews.title: A Friend Indeed
customer_reviews.text: Yes indeed. When you have to do the do, this does the deed. After a long, hard day on the "throne", Angel Soft is always there with its softness and sturdiness. It may have a low price, but it's not like those other low-price, one-ply wonders. Believe me, when I want to get in touch with my inner self, I want it to be a spiritual event, not because of cheap toilet paper! Trust me, when you're done doing the do, while swiping right or left on Tinder, use Angel Soft to wipe up or down on your fender.
customer_reviews.author: WJ Falls

customer_reviews.title: Changed
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this brand for 10 years and it just changed in our last shipment. Rougher and harder to break down leading to more clogs. Totally different, it’s a shame we will now need to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cindysg221

customer_reviews.title: Great price and size
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price for these mega rolls which by the way fit nicely on all my holders, but I'm wondering if the quality has gone down. This order is not as soft as the Angel Soft I buy locally in the stores and it's much thinner, almost like a 1 ply. We'll use up this order but I'll never purchase it again. Best to stay with Charmin or Cottonelle in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma's Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Only toilet paper I buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kind of toilet paper I buy anymore. I love how long the Mega Rolls last, and Angel Soft is the only brand I have consistently liked. I've tried several others, but they all seem to...crumble is the word I'm looking for, I think, when wiping? Anyway, you don't have to change the roll so often because the Mega Rolls are huge, which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Angel Soft Toilet Paper, Mega Rolls, Bath Tissue, 24 Count
customer_reviews.text: I been looking for a soft strong TP and this is as close as I can get without spending too much money. It doesn't tear apart like others, you know when you end with little pieces of paper all over the bathroom. It seem to last longer, the only thing I don't like is that the roll is about 1" shorter than other regular size rolls, companies are doing this now to save money, soon rolls will be a few inches wide. not a big issue but it cost them the 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Yup, it's bigger
customer_reviews.text: It is almost twice the size of Northern, another toilet paper I like. It lasts several days longer. Not quite as soft as Northern. Biggest issue is those big rolls don't fit in the nice free standing round toilet paper holders I already have. I have to leave the extra rolls on top of the toilet, always an invitation to play for kitties.
customer_reviews.author: SGBELVERTA

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and so Clean, Clean
customer_reviews.text: I mean.. it's TP.. but if you want to spring for the good stuff, this is the avenue you should go. Not sure I understand why angels are so soft, but it feels more like rose petals and less like pine cones.. so that's gotta be good, right?
customer_reviews.author: JKinGA

customer_reviews.title: Angel Soft is great!
customer_reviews.text: Since I was a child my mother & father would only buy 1 brand of toilet paper, and as an adult I continued using the same brand until I used Angel Soft, which is better than the previous brand. Angel soft is great, because it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, and it's 2ply, and the rolls are triple the size of most brands.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Convenient and Leave No Residue
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite toilet paper. It’s soft and leaves no residue. We also use it as facial tissues and it saves us lots of money in that. If it’s $20 or less it’s reasonably priced and comes right to our door in 48 hours or less. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: princesa9580

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! How do you review toilet paper! I don’t know! I’m not going to get on the video and use the British voice that that crazy woman uses when she asks people how do they feel LOL I’m just going to say I love this it’s well worth the price not expensive great price great toilet paper use it all the time! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: MMW

product_meta.title: ANGEL SOFT Toilet Paper Bath Tissue, 24 Mega Rolls, 480+ 2-Ply Sheets Per Roll
product_meta.description: AN IDEAL BALANCE OF SOFTNESS AND STRENGTH. ANGEL SOFT Toilet Paper reliably delivers the quality you want at a value you love. Each mega roll has 480+ 2-ply sheets designed to fit in most bathroom toilet paper holders. Because each mega roll includes 4x the sheets of a standard ANGEL SOFT regular size roll, you won’t have to change the roll as often. ANGEL SOFT septic safe toilet tissue is safe for use in standard sewer and septic systems, meaning that it will break down easily after flushing for hassle-free use. ANGEL SOFT Toilet Paper is certified to the Sustainable Forestry Initiative (SFI) sourcing standards.
feature_bullets: ANGEL SOFT toilet paper delivers softness and strength at a good value
Long-lasting rolls with 480+ 2-ply sheets per roll (4x the sheets of a standard ANGEL SOFT regular size roll)
Quality toilet paper for the whole family at a price that won’t break the bank
Flushable and safe for standard septic and sewer systems
Includes 24 mega rolls of classic white toilet paper (4 packs of 6 rolls each)
